title.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Mar. 9, 1918. Lecture in Norrona Lodge

div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Mar. 9, 1918. LECTURE IN NORRONA LODGE

body.p: Chicago has never seen such a struggle as is now being waged. The result of this struggle will be known on election day, April 2. "Shall this city become anti-saloon territory?" This will be up to the voter. The Norrona Good Templar Lodge will present a number of lectures on this question. Reverend J. M. Beckstrom will be the main speaker at all of the lectures.
